game_name: VR-ME: Fire In The Engine Room
game_description: In the script of the scenario «Fire in the Engine Room_VR-ME» after some welding work in the engine room, a fire starts in the bilge of the engine room, also spreading to the main electrical panel.The «Fire in the Engine Room_VR-ME» app includes actions mentioned below that are urgent at the situation of fire: -Go to the meeting point. Recount -Grab, carry and put on ﬁre ﬁghter equipment, prove function and adjustment -Grab one ﬁre extinguisher and put it ready for use. -Going to the engine control room and trying to suﬀocate the ﬁre, with a ﬁre extinguisher. The development of the «Fire in the Engine Room_VR-ME» app is co-funded by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union under the framework of the Virtual Reality for Maritime Emergencies (VR-ME) project.
Publisher: The consortium of the VR-ME project
